object.openmessage: The crypt is open, and William's coffin is inside!

object.description: This is William's skull.

He looks friendly but rough, I better don't try to trick him...
A flask of local liquor.

room.description: A weird magic shop in the town of Anchorhead. Lots of crazy items. These things sure remind me of the Harry Potter series.

object.description: The main street of Anchorhead.
He looks like a nice person. He seems to sell lots of items
Wow! I really would have never figured out how to open this!
A huge lens!
Hi, I am the magic ball. Welcome to the world of Future. Ironically, my future lies in your hands ;)
A shiny and protective amulet
The main street of Anchorhead.
There is a book titled: "Fascinating facts about birth pattern in Anchorhead", In Anchorhead the population ratio MAN:WOMAN = 9:10, Amazing!
He looks like an efficient guy.
The book narrates the stoy of Anchorhead. Interesting.. it also talks about a servant in the mansion.
